Text:
crazy guys ... rar files splitted inton zip files then rared again ... sheer waste of time ..
Not tested yet .. took me half an hour to extract ...

It' been quite long to set up but it works !
So thank you for the upload ...

for info this is the 8.15 build 51 ELITE edition
it includes the filmpack 3 expert. (also works)

A licence code is included for Viewpoint but I could not get it to work ..

any idea ?

Thanks again.
